about_the_game:
Have you ever wanted to simply wander through a quiet, empty place?

If so, LIMSCAPE might just be the perfect game for you.

Inspired by recent liminal space exploration games, LIMSCAPE offers eerie, realistic, and beautifully endless environments.

But—there’s so much more.

LIMSCAPE is a walking simulator that anyone can enjoy, but to think that's all it offers would be a huge misunderstanding.

The true value of LIMSCAPE lies beyond a simple and enjoyable exploration experience.

● What is the true essence of LIMSCAPE?

LIMSCAPE is a creative tool that allows you to build a new dimension of "Web spaces," and at the same time, it’s a three-dimensional browser to explore them.

You don’t have to stop at being just a player.

The moment an idea sparks, you can build a space, play in it, and share it instantly.

With stages connecting and expanding globally, LIMSCAPE brings back the boundless possibilities and excitement reminiscent of the early days of the internet.

This idea will surely ignite both your creative spirit and your sense of play.

● Experience a new realm of possibilities!

----------------------

LIMSCAPE's Appeal

----------------------

1. Create instantly, play instantly!

Play in the spaces you build right away. Experience the joy of seeing your ideas take shape instantly.

With intuitive controls, anyone can enjoy a seamless creative experience.

2. Easy sharing and publishing!

Export your stages with just one click. Upload them to SNS or blogs, and share your unique space with the world.

Link your stages with others or explore those created by other players to embark on endless adventures.

3. A new medium for expression: .limscape

LIMSCAPE is the new ".html," expanding the possibilities of the web into three-dimensional spaces.

4. Shaping the next evolution of the internet!

The spaces you create can connect to others, forming an ever-growing network. It’s the kind of thrill that brings back the excitement of the early internet era.

5. A creative canvas with endless possibilities

LIMSCAPE isn’t just for gaming. As an artist, designer, or creator, you can easily build and showcase your own metaverse gallery.

LIMSCAPE is a platform that transcends the boundaries of traditional gaming, holding limitless potential.

Step into this boundless world of wonder and creativity today!

name: LIMSCAPE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD Ryzen 5 from around 2016 or later
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580 or newer
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD Ryzen 7 from 2018 or later
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 or AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT or newer
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

short_description: A first-person exploration game where you walk through eerie and realistic spaces, searching for an exit. Powered by Unreal Engine's Lumen, it's perfect for those who enjoy quiet walks or simple games. Use the sandbox feature to create your own space! Requires a DirectX12-compatible GPU.
